      • launch

        public final void launch(com.aim.coltonjgriswold.api.utilities.ParticleColor color,
          Player player,
          double speed,
          double distance,
          java.util.List<Material> types)
        Launches the actual particle
        Parameters:
        color - A ParticalColor
        player - The player launching the projectile
        speed - Speed of the projectile (A double between 0.01 and 1.0)
        distance - Distance before partical disaapears (Assuming no effect)
        types - List of materials that can collide (leave empty for all)
